# NSFileProviderEnumerationObserver

**Protocol**

An observer that receives batches of items during enumeration.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSFileProviderEnumerationObserver : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Observing Item Enumeration

- **didEnumerate(_:)**: Provides a batch of enumerated items.
- **finishEnumerating(upTo:)**: Tells the observer that all of the items have been enumerated up to the specified page.
- **finishEnumeratingWithError(_:)**: Tells the observer that an error occurred during item enumeration.
- **suggestedPageSize**: The page size that the system recommends.

## Content

- **Defining Your File Provider’s Content**: Create enumerators to specify your file provider’s content.
- **NSFileProviderPage**: A synchronization point that represents the next batch of items to be returned by an enumerator.
